dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2627 IS: To require the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Swanzey, New Hampshire.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Shaheen (for herself and Ms. Hassan) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To require the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Swanzey, New Hampshire.

section.header: Single, unique ZIP Code for Swanzey, New Hampshire
section.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the United States Postal Service shall designate a single, unique ZIP Code applicable to the area encompassing only Swanzey, New Hampshire, in its entirety.
